actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to authorize the negotiation of a Free Trade Agreement with the Republic of Korea, and to provide for expedited congressional consideration of such an agreement.
short_title: United States-Republic of Korea Free Trade Agreement Act of 1999

summary.text: United States-Republic of Korea Free Trade Agreement Act of 1999 - Declares it to be U.S. policy to seek the elimination of tariff and nontariff barriers in order to achieve more open market access, on a reciprocal basis, to internationally traded goods and services, through bilateral free trade agreements with like-minded countries.Authorizes the President to enter into a free trade agreement with the Republic of Korea. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to apply its fast track procedures (precluding amendments) to the implementing bills for such an agreement.

titles.title: United States-Republic of Korea Free Trade Agreement Act of 1999
A bill to authorize the negotiation of a Free Trade Agreement with the Republic of Korea, and to provide for expedited congressional consideration of such an agreement.
